name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facebook Post ID Displayer by Adacted.com

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays and copies the Post ID for Facebook and Facebook Business Manager video URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge Your Facebook Ads Workflow with the Facebook Post ID Displayer

Tired of wasting time hunting for Post IDs? Facebook Post ID Displayer is your secret weapon for creating Existing Post ads faster and more efficiently. 

Our plugin instantly displays and copies Post IDs for Facebook and Facebook Business Manager video URLs, streamlining your workflow and saving you precious time.

Key Features:
- Instant Post ID display for any Facebook or Business Manager video URL
- One-click copying of Post IDs
- Seamless integration with Facebook Ads Manager
- Boost your productivity and reduce errors in ad creation

Perfect for media buyers, digital marketers, and anyone looking to optimize their Facebook ad campaigns. 

Stop wrestling with Post IDs and start crushing your ad goals with the Facebook Post ID Displayer.

Download now and experience the fun of efficient Facebook ad management!
